name: Dinner Tonight: Cranberry Sauce With Champagne and Currants
description: Really good cranberry sauce isn’t such a secret. It’s basically just a simple concoction of fresh cranberries, sugar, a little salt, and water. Boil for it for a scant five minutes, let cool, and it’s ready to go. Certainly not...
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup Champagne, or other sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the champagne into a medium pot and add the sugar and salt. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Dump in the cranberries and currents, bring back to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Cook for 5 minutes.
Remove and let come to room temperature.
